findings.reasoning: The external call to msg.sender.call() is followed by an update to balances_re_ent3[msg.sender], which could allow re-entrancy.
The external call to address.call() is followed by an update to balances_re_ent8[msg.sender], which could allow re-entrancy.
The external call to msg.sender.transfer() is followed by an update to userBalance_re_ent1[msg.sender], which could allow re-entrancy.
